segments.text: Where do you see yourself three years from now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Working for your company , as the top administrative assistant in your firm !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good answer , B - good answer ! Seriously , though , are you interested in staying in a staff-level position , or would you hope to move into management someday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I haven't thought much about this . I think it's too early to tell . What is most important for me now is to do the best possible job for the company and learn and develop my skills as much as possible .
segments.speaker: S2
